Santa_Clara.Joe Colla Interchange:
The Joe Colla Interchange is an interchange in San Jose, California, connecting Interstate 280 (I-280), I-680, and U.S. Route 101 (US 101). It's named after Joe Colla, a former councilman of San Jose, who also participated in a stunt in 1976 to protest the interchange's delayed construction.


== Description ==
The highway is a four level stack interchange.
